message.discardChanges: Do you want to discard these changes?

validations.alphaNum: The value must be a mix of alphabetic or numeric
validations.integer: The value must be an integer
validations.decimal: The value must be a number
validations.email: The value must be an e-mail address
validations.ipAddress: The value must be an IP address
validations.url: The value must be a URL
validations.minLength: The value must have at least {min} entries
validations.maxLength: The value cannot have more than {max} entries
validations.minValue: The value must be {min} or more
validations.maxValue: The value must be {max} or more
validations.between: The value must be between {min} and {max}
validations.uuid: The value must be a UUID
validations.locationPath: This must be a valid location path

location.port: This must be a valid port
location.ip: This must be a host or IP address, and optionally port
location.invalid: This must be a valid location
